entry.title: duendita: ‘baby teeth’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
duendita: ‘baby teeth’

 Best New Music

NYC-based artist duendita ’s new project, a strong desire to survive, is out today. It’s ten tracks birthed and inspired by travels to Berlin and the music scene they fell into there.

Apr. 4

entry.title: El Michels Affair: ‘Kodak’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
El Michels Affair: ‘Kodak’

 Best New Music

Grammy-winning producer Leon Michels , best known as El Michels Affair , treats us to an instant classic, “Kodak.”

Apr. 3

entry.title: Hannah Cohen: ‘Draggin’’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Hannah Cohen: ‘Draggin’’

 Best New Music

Funny how a song named “Draggin’” can really lift you up. This works because of singer-songwriter Hannah Cohen ’s magical way of blending disparate ideas.

Apr. 2

entry.title: Kendra Morris: ‘In My House’ (Radio Edit) (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Kendra Morris: ‘In My House’ (Radio Edit)

 Best New Music

Brooklyn-based musician Kendra Morris explores chaos and catharsis, what she describes as an overlap of her messy little Brooklyn apartment and the clutter that accumulates in her…

Apr. 1

entry.title: Jacob Alon: ‘Fairy In A Bottle’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Jacob Alon: ‘Fairy In A Bottle’

 Best New Music

We were excited to meet up with Jacob Alon, a seemingly otherworldy Scottish folk artist, while at SXSW this year.

Mar. 31

entry.title: Rita Donte: ‘Zunzun Baba’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Rita Donte: ‘Zunzun Baba’

 Best New Music

Raised in Havana, Cuban singer Rita Donte was weaned on her grandmother's record collection where she became drawn to the music.

Mar. 28

entry.title: Mark Pritchard & Thom Yorke: ‘This Conversation Is Missing Your Voice’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Mark Pritchard & Thom Yorke: ‘This Conversation Is Missing Your Voice’

 Best New Music

Pioneering electronic music producer Mark Pritchard teams with Radiohead/The Smile frontman Thom Yorke to share the full collaborative album Tall Tales (out in May).

Mar. 27

entry.title: Tunde Adebimpe: ‘God Knows’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Tunde Adebimpe: ‘God Knows’

 Best New Music

TV On The Radio frontman Tunde Adebimpe steps into his own spotlight on his debut solo album Thee Black Boltz — out April 18.

Mar. 26
